answers.answer: Hi, the symptom described by you could be due to neuropathy. It is a disorder of the nerves which causes numbness, tingling, burning, unusual sensations and sometimes pain. Diabetes Mellitus can cause neuropathy. Other causes like vitamin deficiencies, alcohol consumption and certain medications can cause neuropathy. All these are suggestions and you will need to consult your primary care physician in person for proper evaluation of your symptoms. He may ask for a Nerve Conduction studies to evaluate the nerves. Hope this helped!
